rules.natural: Either the laptop is powered on or the laptop system is operational.
Provided that there is an alert system, a notification is sent by the alert system.
If a notification has been sent by the alert system, then the laptop system is operational.
Provided that software is running, recovery is complete for the software.
Assuming auto-save is enabled for the software, then if software is running, and if the laptop system is not operational, the laptop system crashes.
Either auto-save is enabled for the software or manual save is enabled for the software.
In the event that manual save is enabled for the software, then if software is running, and if the laptop system is not operational, the laptop system crashes.
Provided that the user has clicked the save button, a document has been saved.
Either the user has clicked the save button or auto-save has been triggered by the software.
Whenever auto-save has been triggered by the software, the laptop system is operational.

Either there is a power outage or, if it is not the case that either the laptop has been moved or (if the laptop is closed, then it is not the case that the laptop is powered on), then the laptop has been dropped.
Provided that the charger is actively charging, the charging indicator is on for the laptop.
Either the charger is actively charging or the charger is on standby.
If the charger is on standby, then either a charger is connected or it is not the case that the laptop is powered on.
Given that the keyboard is wireless, then if a keyboard is connected, either the laptop is plugged in or it is not the case that the laptop is powered on.
Either the keyboard is wireless or the keyboard is wired.
Assuming the keyboard is wired, then if a keyboard is connected, either the laptop is plugged in or it is not the case that the laptop is powered on.
Provided that the user is engaged in focused work, then if the user is active, the user is typing.
Either the user is engaged in focused work or the user is engaged in casual work.
If the user is engaged in casual work, then the user is engaged in intermittent work.
Provided that the user is engaged in intermittent work, then if the user is active, the user is typing.
Whenever the user has started a break, then it is not the case that the user is idle.
Either the user has started a break or the user is on an ongoing break.
If the user is on an ongoing break, then the user has ended a break.
In case the user has ended a break, it is not the case that the user is idle.
Either coffee has been spilled or, if the user has drunk coffee, then the laptop system is operational.
Assuming the user is careful, then coffee has not been spilled.
Either the user is careful or the user is clumsy.
Either the laptop screen is on or, if it is not the case that either the laptop is plugged in or it is not the case that the laptop is powered on, then the laptop has a low battery.
Provided that the user is clumsy, the user is accident-prone.
Provided that the alert is active, the alert is processing.
Either the alert is active or the alert is pending.
In the event that the alert is pending, then if there is an alert system, the laptop system is operational.
Assuming the alert is processing, then if there is an alert system, the laptop system is operational.
If backup is enabled, then in case the laptop system is not operational, the laptop system crashes.
Either backup is enabled or backup is running.
Whenever auto-recovery is enabled for the software, then if the laptop system is not operational, the laptop system crashes.
If the user is working, then the laptop system is operational.
Provided that recovery has been triggered for the software, auto-recovery is enabled for the software.
In case recovery is complete for the software, recovery has been triggered for the software.
Either the user has initiated a save or auto-save has been performed by the software.
If auto-save has been performed by the software, then the laptop system is operational.
Either the save has been confirmed by the software or the save has been verified by the software.
In the event that the save has been verified by the software, then if the user has initiated a save, a document has been saved.
Provided that the save has been logged by the software, the save is complete for the software.
Either the save has been logged by the software or the save has been recorded by the software.
Assuming the save has been recorded by the software, then if the save has been confirmed by the software, and if the user has initiated a save, a document has been saved.
In case the save is complete for the software, then if the save has been confirmed by the software, and if the user has initiated a save, a document has been saved.
If coffee is available, then the laptop system is operational.
Either coffee is available or the user has drunk coffee.
Provided that the user has drunk coffee, there is an alert system.
Provided that it is not the case that if the user is accident-prone then coffee has not been spilled, then there is a coffee stain on the furniture.
Assuming it is not the case that if backup is running then (if the laptop system is not operational, the laptop system crashes), then backup has failed.
If it is not the case that if the user is not working then the user is typing, then the user is idle.
In case it is not the case that if the user is not working then the user is typing, then the user is distracted.
Provided that it is not the case that if the user is not working then the user is typing, it is not the case that the user is distracted.
If the user is not working, then the user is active.
If the laptop system is not operational, then it is not the case that the laptop system crashes.

It is not the case that the user is typing.

(A1 ∨ G).natural: Either the laptop is powered on or the laptop system is operational.

(A10 → A11).natural: Provided that there is an alert system, a notification is sent by the alert system.

(A10 → G).natural: Whenever there is an alert system, the laptop system is operational.

(A11 → G).natural: If a notification has been sent by the alert system, then the laptop system is operational.

(A13 → (¬G → A12)).natural: Given that software is running, in case the laptop system is not operational, the laptop system crashes.

(A13 → A49).natural: Whenever software is running, auto-recovery is enabled for the software.

(A13 → A50).natural: If software is running, then recovery is triggered for the software.

(A13 → A51).natural: Provided that software is running, recovery is complete for the software.

(A14 → (A13 → (¬G → A12))).natural: Assuming auto-save is enabled for the software, then if software is running, and if the laptop system is not operational, the laptop system crashes.

(A15 → (A13 → (¬G → A12))).natural: In the event that manual save is enabled for the software, then if software is running, and if the laptop system is not operational, the laptop system crashes.

(A16 ∨ G).natural: Either a document has been saved or the laptop system is operational.

(A20 ∨ (A19 → ¬A1)).natural: Either the laptop has been moved or, if the laptop is closed, then it is not the case that the laptop is powered on.

(A23 ∨ ¬A1).natural: Either a charger is connected or it is not the case that the laptop is powered on.

¬A20.natural: It is not the case that the laptop has been moved.

¬A21.natural: It is not the case that the laptop has been dropped.

¬A22.natural: It is not the case that there is a power outage.

¬A23.natural: It is not the case that a charger is connected.

¬A24.natural: It is not the case that the charging indicator is on for the laptop.

¬A3.natural: It is not the case that the laptop has a low battery.

¬A34.natural: It is not the case that the user is idle.

¬A38.natural: It is not the case that coffee has been spilled.

¬A4.natural: It is not the case that the laptop screen is on.

¬A42.natural: It is not the case that there is a coffee stain on the furniture.

¬A48.natural: It is not the case that backup has failed.

¬A6.natural: It is not the case that the user is typing.
